text: Events during the year 1929 in Italy. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Victor Emmanuel III * Prime Minister: Benito Mussolini ==Events== *11 February – The Lateran Treaty, an agreement between the Kingdom of Italy and the Holy See, is signed in Rome. *date unknown – The first of the Saccopastore skulls is discovered. ==Births== *11 January – Nicoletta Orsomando, Italian continuity announcer *26 February – Paolo Ferrari, actor (died 2018) *8 July – Milena Greppi, hurdler ==Deaths== *12 April – Enrico Ferri, Italian criminologist (born 1856) ==References== Category:1920s in Italy Category:Years of the 20th century in Italy Italy Italy
title: 1929 in Italy
